snippet: City erased the French power Paris St.-Germain with a 1-0 home win, winning on aggregate, 3-2, and advanced to the cusp of the Champions League final....

headline.main: With Blistering Kick, Manchester City Rights a Choppy Season
headline.print_headline: With Blistering Kick, Manchester City Rights a Choppy Season

abstract: Manchester City beats Paris St-Germain 1-0, to advance to UEFA Champions League semifinal.
lead_paragraph: City erased the French power Paris St.-Germain with a 1-0 home win, winning on aggregate, 3-2, and advanced to the cusp of the Champions League final.

snippet: Both of Tuesday's Champions League games, Manchester City versus Dynamo Kiev and Atlético Madrid versus P.S.V. Eindhoven, finished scoreless....

lead_paragraph: Both of Tuesday's Champions League games, Manchester City versus Dynamo Kiev and Atlético Madrid versus P.S.V. Eindhoven, finished scoreless.

snippet: With two months of a gripping Premier League season left Leicester City are closing on the title and it is not fanciful to suggest that Tottenham Hotspur, West Ham United and Southampton could complete the top four....

headline.main: Fantasy Becoming Reality in Premier League Shakeup
headline.print_headline: Fantasy Becoming Reality in Premier League Shakeup

lead_paragraph: With two months of a gripping Premier League season left Leicester City are closing on the title and it is not fanciful to suggest that Tottenham Hotspur, West Ham United and Southampton could complete the top four.

snippet: Manuel Pellegrini’s time is ending at Manchester City, and he is determined to take the club further than it has ever gone in the Champions League....

headline.main: Pellegrini Looks to Leave Manchester City on Top
headline.print_headline: Pellegrini Looks to Leave City on Top

lead_paragraph: Manuel Pellegrini’s time is ending at Manchester City, and he is determined to take the club further than it has ever gone in the Champions League.

snippet: The winner of Saturday's Championship (second tier) showdown between Middlesbrough and Brighton are guaranteed at least 170 million pounds ($246.4 million) with their promotion to the Premier League, according to Deloitte....

headline.main: Mega Riches Await Premier League Hopefuls-Deloitte
headline.print_headline: Mega Riches Await Premier League Hopefuls-Deloitte

lead_paragraph: The winner of Saturday's Championship (second tier) showdown between Middlesbrough and Brighton are guaranteed at least 170 million pounds ($246.4 million) with their promotion to the Premier League, according to Deloitte.

snippet: Leicester City's remarkable Premier League triumph after starting the season as 5,000-1 outsiders to win the title made the pages of the press around the world on Tuesday....

headline.main: Leicester's Premier League Fairytale Makes Papers Worldwide
headline.print_headline: Leicester's Premier League Fairytale Makes Papers Worldwide

lead_paragraph: Leicester City's remarkable Premier League triumph after starting the season as 5,000-1 outsiders to win the title made the pages of the press around the world on Tuesday.

snippet: REUTERS - After the recent signings of Paul Pogba and John Stones, Manchester United and Manchester City's summer transfer spending accounts for almost half of the total outlay by Premier League clubs, according to a recent study by Spreadex.com....

headline.main: Manchester Clubs Dominate Premier League Transfer Spending
headline.print_headline: Manchester Clubs Dominate Premier League Transfer Spending

lead_paragraph: REUTERS - After the recent signings of Paul Pogba and John Stones, Manchester United and Manchester City's summer transfer spending accounts for almost half of the total outlay by Premier League clubs, according to a recent study by Spreadex.com.

snippet: Middlesbrough captain Grant Leadbitter will miss the start of the Premier League season and left back James Husband is facing a lengthy spell on the sidelines, the promoted club said on Thursday....

headline.main: Middlesbrough Captain to Miss Premier League Kickoff
headline.print_headline: Middlesbrough Captain to Miss Premier League Kickoff

lead_paragraph: Middlesbrough captain Grant Leadbitter will miss the start of the Premier League season and left back James Husband is facing a lengthy spell on the sidelines, the promoted club said on Thursday.

snippet: Adam Johnson, a former player on England’s international team, was sentenced to six years in prison for child sex offenses in Bradford, England....

headline.main: Former Premier League Player Is Jailed
headline.print_headline: Former Premier League Player Is Jailed

abstract: Adam Johnson, former player for Manchester City and England's international team, is sentenced to six years in prison for child sex offenses involving 15-year-old girl.
lead_paragraph: Adam Johnson, a former player on England’s international team, was sentenced to six years in prison for child sex offenses in Bradford, England.

snippet: Barcelona are concerned about the financial clout of the Premier League when the new English television deal kicks in for top-flight clubs next season, said president Josep Maria Bartomeu....

headline.main: Barca Worried About Premier League Wealth-President
headline.print_headline: Barca Worried About Premier League Wealth-President

lead_paragraph: Barcelona are concerned about the financial clout of the Premier League when the new English television deal kicks in for top-flight clubs next season, said president Josep Maria Bartomeu.
